question: Which Indian state/UT launched a mobile application named ‘Satark Nagrik’?
explanation:
The Lieutenant General of the UT of Jammu and Kashmir, Manoj Sinha launched a mobile application named ‘Satark Nagrik’.
The application aims to enable citizens submit their grievances related to corruption and communicate the information about corruption faster. He also launched the Departmental Vigilance Officers (DVO) Portal.
